================================.FormStartPosition
### Tender Announcement: Facilitation and Coordination of Expert Review Panels

#### Reference Number: cb-7437-1095321 
#### Amendment Number: 7
#### Solicitation Number: 5000075601
#### Publication Date: July 21, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: September 15, 2023, at 14:00
#### Amendment Date: September 15, 2023
#### Expected Contract Start Date: September 8, 2023
#### Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is inviting bids from qualified bidders for the facilitation and coordination of expert review panels. 

This solicitation is a competitive, open-bidding process.

The selected bidder will be responsible for providing management advisory services, business and corporate management consultation services, and training planning, facilitation, and delivery services.

The contract is expected to commence on September 8, 2023, and end on March 31, 2025.

The tender closing date is September 15, 2023, at 14:00.

### Selection Criteria

The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to select the winning bidder.

### Notice Description

Through this Request for Proposal (RFP), NRCan seeks to engage resources who will support the development, operation, and improvement of the Billion Trees program grants and contributions management system.

The selected bidder will be required to demonstrate expertise in management advisory services, business and corporate management consultation services, and training planning, facilitation, and delivery services.

### Attachment

Tender attachments and supporting documents can be accessed via the links below:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7437/rfp-5000075601-002-facilitation-and-coordination-of-expert-review-panels.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7437/ddp-5000075601-001---facilitation-et-coordination-dun-bassin-dexperts-en-la-matiere-qualifies.pdf

### Contact Information

For more information or to request a tender package, please contact Moira Farkas at (403) 462-1162 or moira.farkas@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca.

Note: The tender has expired and is no longer accepting submissions.
